channel.title: Javascript – Rashid Azar's Weblog
channel.description: Don't document the program; program the document.

item.title: Introduction to jQuery
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: A javascript framework is required for every web application and jQuery is one of them. Today I delivered a presentation on jQuery in my company premises. You can browse the demo application at following URL: http://114.143.187.102/rashid/jquerydemo.nsf/index.xsp

item.title: JSON
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: JSON has gain its popularity in web development and I was also exploring what is JSON and how is it useful in web development. I made a presentation and conducted a session about JSON at my company premises. [slideshare id=14586517&doc=json-121004053824-phpapp01]

item.title: XPage – Sort View Column
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: I was searching for a work around to allow view column to be sortable by clicking on column header but I was not able to find any reliable solution using View Panel. Now I found a way to provide this feature using Repeat Control or Data Table. Please go through the following code. [javascript] var … Continue reading XPage – Sort View Column →

item.title: Disable X in Dojo Dialog
item.dc:creator: warlog
item.description: I found a trick to disable [x] on the top right corner of dojo dialog and force user to click on the close button to close the dialog box. Create a div element in your html web page and pass its id to following function to achieve this: [crayon-5bfab17287f1e343956290/]
